t.x: A building where people live, or the concept of 'home'. One of the most basic and frequently used words.
e: I house / home every day.
House / Home is important in daily life.
Through house / home, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making house / home a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: An institution for educating students. Includes elementary, middle, high school, and university.
e: I school every day.
School is important in daily life.
Through school, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making school a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A form of housing. The most common housing type in Korea.
e: I apartment every day.
Apartment is important in daily life.
Through apartment, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making apartment a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A small store open 24 hours. Sells food, daily necessities, etc.
e: I convenience store every day.
Convenience store is important in daily life.
Through convenience store, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making convenience store a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A large store selling various products. Short for 'supermarket'.
e: I mart / supermarket every day.
Mart / Supermarket is important in daily life.
Through mart / supermarket, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making mart / supermarket a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A place where sick people are treated.
e: I hospital / clinic every day.
Hospital / Clinic is important in daily life.
Through hospital / clinic, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making hospital / clinic a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A place that sells medicine. Some medicines can be bought without prescription.
e: I pharmacy every day.
Pharmacy is important in daily life.
Through pharmacy, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making pharmacy a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A financial institution for depositing or borrowing money.
e: I bank every day.

Through bank, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making bank a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A place to send or receive mail. Also provides delivery services.
e: I post office every day.

t.x: An agency that investigates crimes and maintains order.
e: I police station every day.

Through police station, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making police station a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: An agency for firefighting and emergency services.
e: I fire station every day.

t.x: A place to read or borrow books.
e: I library every day.

t.x: An outdoor space where people can rest and exercise.
e: I park every day.

Through park, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making park a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A Korean-style sauna and relaxation space. You can stay overnight.
e: I jjimjilbang (korean spa) every day.
Jjimjilbang (Korean spa) is important in daily life.
Through jjimjilbang (korean spa), I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making jjimjilbang (korean spa) a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A place selling coffee and drinks. Also used for studying or meeting.
e: I cafe every day.
Cafe is important in daily life.
Through cafe, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making cafe a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A space for singing. Representative Korean entertainment culture.
e: I noraebang (karaoke) every day.
Noraebang (Karaoke) is important in daily life.
Through noraebang (karaoke), I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making noraebang (karaoke) a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A place to play computer games. Also called internet cafe.
e: I pc bang (internet cafe) every day.
PC bang (Internet cafe) is important in daily life.
Through pc bang (internet cafe), I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making pc bang (internet cafe) a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A store that washes or irons clothes.
e: I laundry / dry cleaner every day.

Through laundry / dry cleaner, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making laundry / dry cleaner a habit is key to improving quality of life.

t.x: A place to cut or style hair.
e: I hair salon every day.

t.x: A facility with exercise equipment. Fitness center.
e: I gym / fitness center every day.
